item.title: Base URL for Your Laravel 4 Website
item.description: To get base URL of your website to generate links to your content or assets do following: Set $url in app/config/app.php to your base URL: 'url' => 'http://localhost/example', Use it everywhere with URL::to(), for example: echo URL::to('assets/css/general.css'); /* outputs http://localhost/example/assets/css/general.css */
